import React, { FC } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { orderRemove, quantityAdd, quantityLess } from '../../../store/orderSlice' import { orderType } from '../../../types' import ButtonRemove from './ButtonRemove' import NumberStepper from './NumberStepper' interface ItemOrderType { product: orderType orderRemove:(id:number) => void quantityLess:(id:number) => void quantityAdd:(id:number) => void } const ItemOrder: FC = ({ product, orderRemove, quantityAdd, quantityLess }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{product.food_name}

{product.food_price}

) } export default ItemOrder
